constraints.name: tree_structure
constraints.description: 图必须是树结构（无环连通图）

constraints.name: preorder_traversal
constraints.description: 节点编号按前序遍历顺序排列

constraints.name: adjacency_ordering
constraints.description: 每个节点的相邻节点按逆时针方向递增编号

constraints.name: odd_cycle_coverage
constraints.description: 所有长度为奇数的简单环上至少有一条边被覆盖

constraints.name: non_intersecting_edges
constraints.description: 外环道路在端点之外不相交
